Sec. 30-354. Brake equipment required.
Every motor-driven cycle must comply with the provisions of except that:
Motorcycles and motor-driven cycles need not be equipped with parking brakes.
The wheel of a sidecar attached to a motorcycle or to a motor-driven cycle, and the front wheel of a motor-driven cycle need not be equipped with brakes, provided that such motorcycle or motor-driven cycle is capable of complying with the performance requirements of this chapter.
